item.title: Publications
item.description: Books Blom-Hansen, Jens, Anne Skorkjær Binderkrantz, Martin Bækgaard, Daniel Finke, Roman Senninger and Søren Serritzlew (forthcoming) Policy preparation inside the European Commission, Oxford University Press. Journal Articles Senninger, Roman, Martin Bækgaard and Henrik Seeberg (forthcoming) Unsuccessful candidates are more concerned about electoral fairness than election winners, Journal of Politics. [Preprint] Senninger, Roman and Henrik Seeberg (2024) Which Information Do Politicians Pay Attention To? Evidence from a Field Experiment and Interviews, British Journal of Political Science, 1-18.

item.title: Roman Senninger
item.description: I am an Associate Professor of Political Science at Aarhus University. My research centers on political elites, institutions, and public opinion in Europe. Methodologically, I have a strong interest in experiments and computational social science. I am currently holding a three-year Semper Ardens Accelerate Grant from the Carlsberg Foundation.
